name: HTML5
description: I use HTML5 to create the structure of my web pages and their content.

name: CSS3
description: I use CSS3 to create the layout of my web pages, color, fonts, and style.

name: JavaScript (ES6)
description: I use JavaScript to make dynamic and interactive web pages that engage the user.

name: ReactJS
description: I use ReactJS to build interactive web apps quickly and efficiently with less code than I would with JavaScript.

name: Responsive Design
description: I use Media Queries or Bootstrap to create different layouts depending on the size of the viewport.

name: Version Control/Git
description: I use Git to keep track, control and share my code source changes throughout development.

name: REST APIs
description: I use REST APIs to facilitate communication between my web apps and other platforms, letting them exchange data.

name: Debugging
description: I use breakpoints in my browser to find errors and mistakes in my source code to fix them.

name: Build Tools
description: I use Vite or Parcel to bundle my apps modules into a single browser-compatible JavaScript file.

name: Hosting
description: I use Netlify to make my web apps accessible online because it allows continuous deployment by using GitHub.
